option.saltroad.general.anchor_tooltips: Anchor tooltips to the sides of the screen
option.saltroad.tooltip.showAvg80Price: Show average price of the middle 80% (exclude outliers)
option.saltroad.tooltip.showUnidAvgPrice: Show average price for unidentified itemss
option.saltroad.tooltip.showUnidAvg80Pri: Show unidentified average price of the middle 80% (exclude outliers)
